title: Excessively Long Ranked Queue Time
body:
Attached is a screencap of my queue for a Silver 2 ranked game.  I'm inclined to think that 9+ minutes wait means there is something wrong with matchmaking.

It just popped at 10:30 wait time, but that's a third of an average game just waiting to get into select.

replies.body: Long queue times can happen every once in a while depending on the number of players, roles, and/or games available. I don't think there should be too much cause for alarm unless it's happening consistently. If it does, let me know and I'll see if I can get someone to take a closer look.

Oh come on RiotBok, don't bullshit him.

If you don't queue as support or fill you should expect queue times from 10 - 20 minutes.  If you queue as support or fill you will probably get a game in less than 30 seconds.
how many solo players left the game to make a silver game queue 9 mins long?
Whats about playing Normal Draft (Top / Mid) and it taking well over 48minutes. Consistently...

The number of supports bottleneck the number of games that are played.
You aren't queuing up as a support.
That's really all there is to it.
Yes, I had 9 minutes, then re-queued; now at 5 minutes and counting... I guess I'll play a normal. WAIT. I'M IN!
